tickets.subject: Jan Jaramillo - 2 Factor Setup Request
tickets.description:
Hi Jan,

Please let me know what date/time would be ok for me to give you a call to enable you on two-factor.

Essentially we will be setting up your cell phone to be tied with your APR email, so if anyone tries to sign in who isn't you, it'll text you to verify that it is actually you trying to sign in.

Also try to have with you any mobile device that you have your APR email on (laptop/ipads/computers) as I can help set these up as your trusted devices your your own ease of use to not have to deal with 2 Factor for email.

Thanks!

From: Smarter Agent Mobile <support@smarteragent.com>
Reply-To: Smarter Agent Mobile <support@smarteragent.com>
Date: Monday, April 16, 2018 at 1:18 PM
To: Chalet Kerr <ckerr@apr.com>
Subject: Introducing Your New Alain Pinel Realtors Mobile App

 

Can’t see images below? View Online (https://us11.campaign-archive.com/?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=64c5051d45&e=c09cebb8e1)

 

Introducing Your New
Alain Pinel Realtors Mobile App

Dear Xiaolei Kerr,

Your redesigned Alain Pinel Realtors Mobile App powered by Smarter Agent Mobile is here! With a new look, your agent app is personalized with your name, photo and contact information. Tell your clients and prospects about your app's new look. It's a great way to engage them and get repeat and referral business when they share it with their family and friends.

Before you can begin sharing, make sure to download your personal app onto your own device. Watch the agent training webinar (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=3eed037fdd&e=c09cebb8e1)  to learn about your new agent branded app, how to download and share with others and how you can use your app to bring in new business.

 

How to download and start sharing your personal app

Your personalized URL

http://mobileapp.apr.com/APRXKERR (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=9498f9747d&e=c09cebb8e1)

Desktop and Mobile Engagement Page

Your URL is http://mobileapp.apr.com/APRXKERR (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=9498f9747d&e=c09cebb8e1) . Visit this link on your device to download the app instantly, and your clients can do the same. Then, simply add your personalized URL to your email signature block, your marketing materials and social media posts so anyone can easily get to your mobile engagement page and download your app.

Your unique app code

 

Text
APRXKERR
to (408) 617-8017 (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=2193c28b22&e=c09cebb8e1)

 

Yours is APRXKERR. Anyone can text your unique code to (408) 617-8017 (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=2193c28b22&e=c09cebb8e1) to receive a link to download your new app and search homes for sale.

Send the app to any mobile user

Tap the Share button in your app's menu to share your app with clients. People using your app can also use this feature to share your app with others!

Custom QR Code

Display the QR code on flyers and other marketing materials for users to scan and easily download your app.

 

Your MobiBoard Dashboard

With MobiBoard Dashboard you can keep track of what listings your clients are interested in and see how engaged they are.

1.      Tap the Login button on your flyout menu.

2.      Tap “Realtor? Log in here.” at the bottom of the page.

3.      The first time you log in to your MobiBoard Dashboard, enter the email address you use for your app’s account and "engage" as your temporary password. You will see the message: "Please confirm your email address to log in."

4.      You will receive an email that asks you to click a link to register your account and set your password.

5.      Once your password is set, go back to your app and use your email and password to log in.

6.      Once logged in, tap the Your Dashboard button in your flyout menu to open your MobiBoard Dashboard and review your app usage.

 

For technical support:

Please submit a ticket through the App Help button on the flyout menu of your app (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=4b6d813966&e=c09cebb8e1)

To learn more:

Watch the agent training webinar for your app (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=3eed037fdd&e=c09cebb8e1)

 

 

 

756 Haddon Avenue Suite, Collingswood, NJ 08108 (https://smarteragent.us11.list-manage.com/track/click?u=44ab740733a05b9d20b363af6&id=cc88655a62&e=c09cebb8e1)

May 05, 2018 - 2:00PM to 4:30PM May 06, 2018 - 2:00PM to 4:30PM

 

Description

This beautiful home welcomes you at the entry with lush gardens and relaxing water feature. An entertainer's dream with grand living space, vaulted ceilings and oversized windows. Outdoor decks and patio provide for indoor/outdoor living. Flexible floor plan w/spacious living room and family room with wine fridge/bar. Family room flows into the dining area and to the cooks dream kitchen with large island, ample cabinetry and counterspace. Expansive media room off the kitchen for movie night! 3 bedrooms, 3 baths and a spacious laundry room are ideally located on the lower level. Sumptuous master retreat with large en suite and walk in closet. Den with custom Berkeley Mills cabinetry. Nestled in the Claremont Hills with backyard playstructure, zip line and various seating areas to enjoy the outdoors. Wooded views provides privacy, yet a short distance from commute options and amenities
